Verses: 1 pelisdhar Isravelarote Yuththampanninaarkal; Isravelar Pelisdharukku Munpaaka Murindhoti, Kilpovaa Malaiyile Vettuntu Vizhundhaarkal.
2 pelisdhar Savulaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Nerungith Thotarndhu, Savulin Kumaararaakiya Yonaththaanaiyum Apinadhaapaiyum Malkisookaavaiyum Vettippottaarkal.
3 savulukku Virodhamaai Yuththam Palaththadhu; Vilveerar Avanaik Kantu Nerunginaarkal; Appozhudhu Savul Vilveeraraal Mikavum Kaayappattu,

4 than Aayudhadhaariyai Nokki: Andha Viruththasedhanam Illaadhavarkal Vandhu, Ennaik Kuththippottu, Ennai Avamaanappatuththaadhapatikku, Nee Un Pattayaththai Uruvi, Ennaik Kuththippotu Endraan; Avanutaiya Aayudhadhaari Mikavum Payappattadhinaal, Appatich Cheyyamaatten Endraan; Appozhudhu Savul Pattayaththai Nattu Adhinmel Vizhundhaan.
5 savul Seththupponadhai Avan Aayudhadhaari Kantapodhu, Avanum Than Pattayaththinmel Vizhundhu, Avanotekootach Cheththupponaan.
6 appatiye Andraiyadhinam Savulum, Avan Moondru Kumaararum, Avan Aayudhadhaariyum, Avanutaiya Ellaa Manusharum Orumikkach Cheththupponaarkal.

7 isravelar Murindhotinaarkal Endrum, Savulum Avan Kumaararum Seththupponaarkal Endrum, Pallaththaakkukku Ippaalum Yordhaanukku Ippaalum Irundha Isravelar Kantapodhu, Avarkal Pattanangalai Vittu Otipponaarkal; Appozhudhu Pelisdhar Vandhu, Avaikalile Kutiyirundhaarkal.
8 vettuntavarkalai Urindhukolla, Pelisdhar Marunaal Vandhapodhu, Avarkal, Savulum Avan Moondru Kumaararum Kilpovaa Malaiyile Vizhundhukitakkiradhaik Kantu,

9 avan Thalaiyai Vetti, Avan Aayudhangalai Etuththukkontu, Thangal Vikkirakangalin Kovilkalilum Janangalukkullum Seydhiyaip Pirasiththappatuththumpati, Avaikalaip Pelisdhar Thesaththile Sutrilum Anuppi,
10 avan Aayudhangalai Asdharoth Thevanutaiya Kovilile Vaiththu, Avan Utalaip Pedhsaanin Alangaththile Thookkippottaarkal.
11 pelisdhar Savulukkuch Cheydhadhaik Keeleyaaththesaththu Yaapes Pattanaththaar Kettapodhu,

12 avarkalile Palasaalikal Ellaarum Ezhundhu Iraamuzhudhum Natandhu Poi, Pedhsaanin Alangaththilirundha Savulin Utalaiyum Avan Kumaararin Utalkalaiyum Etuththu, Yaapesukkuk Kontuvandhu, Avaikalai Ange Thakanampanni,
13 avarkalutaiya Elumpukalai Etuththu, Yaapesilirukkira Thoppile Atakkampanni, Ezhunaal Upavaasampanninaarkal.
